panels.description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("host" = 'telegraf') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname" fill(null)

panels.description: The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized

targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("host" = 'telegraf') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname" fill(null)

panels.description: The table of power supply status maintained by the environmental monitor card

targets.query: SELECT last("os_version") FROM "Afranet-R5_interfaces" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname"

panels.title: Power Supply

panels.description: An entry in the ambient temperature status table, representing the status of the associated testpoint maintained by the environmental monitor

targets.query: SELECT last("os_version") FROM "Afranet-R5_interfaces" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname"

panels.title: Temperature

panels.description: An entry in the fan status table, representing the status of the associated fan maintained by the environmental monitor

targets.query: SELECT last("os_version") FROM "Afranet-R5_interfaces" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname"

panels.title: Fan

panels.description: A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software

targets.query: SELECT last("os_version") FROM "Afranet-R5_interfaces" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname"

panels.title: OS Version

panels.description: A table of overall CPU statistics
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: An entry in the memory pool monitoring table

targets.query: SELECT (last("memory_used")/(last("memory_free") + last("memory_used")))*100 FROM "YOUR-NAME" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "memory_name" fill(none)

panels.title: Memory

panels.description: The total number of octets received and transmitted on the interface, including framing characters. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime

targets.query: SELECT  NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(last("ifInOctets"), 1s) *8 FROM "YOUR-NAME" WHERE ("ifOperStatus"=1) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifName" fill(none)

panels.title: Data Rate (IN)

targets.query: SELECT  NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(last("ifOutOctets"), 1s) *8 FROM "YOUR-NAME" WHERE ("ifOperStatus"=1) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifName" fill(none)

panels.description: An entry containing management information applicable to a particular interface

targets.query: SELECT last("ifOperStatus"), last("ifAlias"), last("ifHighSpeed")*1000000, last("ifInErrors"), last("ifOutErrors") FROM "YOUR-NAME" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "ifIndex", "ifName"
SELECT last("ip") AS "IP Address", last("net_mask") AS "Net Mask" FROM "YOUR-NAME" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY "ifIndex"

panels.title: Port Summary

panels.description: A conceptual row in the cswSwitchInfoTable describing a switch information.
panels.title: Switch Info

alert.name: Switch Core / Stack Port Info alert

panels.description: A conceptual row in the cswStackPortInfoTable. An entry contains information about a stackport
panels.title: Stack Port Info

panels.description: An entry in the cswStackPowerInfoTable for each of the power stacks in a single data stack. This entry contains information regarding the power stack
panels.title: Stack Power Info
